## After the workshop

::: incremental

- Ask a second opinion from those around you!
- Ask the local experts at the [BDSI Drop-In Sessions](https://bdsi.anu.edu.au/news-events/event-series/bdsi-bioinformatics-and-statistics-drop-sessions).
- Use online resources such as:
  - [R for Data Science](https://r4ds.hadley.nz/)
  - [R4DS Online Learning Community](https://rfordatasci.com/)
  - Ask questions on [Stack Overflow](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/r) or [Posit Community](https://community.rstudio.com/).
- You can continue to use the [ANU Learning Data Slack Community](https://anu-bdsi.github.io/training-R1/#slack) to connect with each other _(please don't DM teaching team unless it is a private matter -- others can learn from your question!)_

:::
